column4: boys could anybody help me troubleshoot the problem with my evolution mail account with gmail?
Shure, post your question.
good to know a gentoo kitty , so qt :) . problem is it won't talk to the server it says it couldn't. i tried with pop either and didn't work
So let's get  back to the start line- I'm not an experienced user but I will try my best to help you. Did you enabled your gmail account to be able to use pop/imap?
You go to Settings>Forwarding and pop/imap.
So by this answer I understand that you did that already, yes? Enable pop/imap
Maybe that link would help you. Try deleting your account from evolution then configure it again.
do you know if they changed some policy respecting ports or something from karmic to lucid?
just a second, I will try to see know if my evolution works.
I don't think they would do such a thing, they are not Yahoo:)
One second to see if my evolution works with gmail.
do you say that because the last minute yahoo to google switch in lucid? i don't know anything bout that. it was a surprise to see good ol google in lucid too hehe
I'm saying yahoo because of problems with yahoo mesenger protocol and 3rd party apps.
Here, evolution works fine on 10.04 amd 64 ubuntu version.
Have you tried deleting the account and trying again?
Try that know and see if it works. Please be attentive when you write your password and all the things in evolution. You could have done a  typo and that's why it can sometimes not work.
Also when not working, what errors, messages do you get?
Works now?
So I think you typed wrong the password so that's why you failed to connect or other info...
Glad it works now!
I see...
